intro: Bomarea torta, commonly known as the spiral bomarea, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Alstroemeriaceae and is characterized by its striking, spiral-shaped inflorescence. Bomarea torta is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and unique floral structure.
